mapper.delete: delete from favorite where user_id=#{userId} and aptCode = #{aptCode}
mapper.select: select apart.apartmentName, max(cast(replace(deal.dealAmount, ',', '') as DECIMAL)) as maxPrice, min(cast(replace(deal.dealAmount, ',', '') as DECIMAL)) as minPrice from apart, deal, favorite where apart.aptCode = deal.aptCode and deal.aptCode in (select aptCode from favorite where user_id = #{userId}) group by deal.aptCode;
